thumb.title: Bruce Hurwitz Presents MEET THE EXPERTS with Richard Blank on Gamification and Work Excellence
thumb.description: Bruce Hurwitz Presents MEET THE EXPERTS with Richard Blank on Gamification and Work ExcellenceBruce Hurwitz Presents: MEET THE EXPERTS is a service of Hurwitz Strategic Staffing, Ltd. We hope you will consider us for all your staffing, career counseling and speech writing needs. You can find us on the web at www.hsstaffing.com. About our interview she says viewers will learn: Taking a chance, advanced telemarketing strategy, conflict management, interpersonal soft skills, customer support, rhetoric, gamification, pinball machines, employee motivation and phonetic micro expression reading.https://youtu.be/SwKA8JF1ZOohttps://youtu.be/WVpQGgv_f24https://youtu.be/JDQL3TDs5Y4https://youtu.be/BpJD3W3CtIAhttps://youtu.be/15d1SHMwfdQhttps://youtu.be/6JOjtDmZfo4https://youtu.be/J3K5h2BPhN4
